title: Quick question about leaving/abandoning a game for the Teemoing icon
body: When you say leave a game does that count if you disconnect for a bit but return, or is this just quitting a game completely that disqualifies you from the icon?

replies.body:
The [Official Announcement](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/featured/skins/the-teemoing-2016) mentions *abandoning* a match forfeits your icon. I'd imagine if you disconnected and quickly reconnected, you'd be okay, but it really depends on the specific situation. Maybe you'll want to win another Doom Bots match just to be sure.

Let me know if you have any other questions.
So you lose it if you abandon it, but you can regain it right? Do you have to not leave until the Teemoing is over?
Winning a single Doom Bots game without leaving or disconnecting should earn you the icon. No other matches should matter, disconnecting or not, as far as I know.
Well rip cause I'm never beating that gauntlet.
Any Doom Bots mode should be fine, it doesn't have to be the gauntlet. ^.^
